scripts.basic: npm run setup:basic && cd basic && npm run dev
scripts.chatbot: npm run setup:chatbot && concurrently -n "FRONTEND,SERVER" -c "cyan,yellow" "cd chatbot/frontend && npm run dev" "cd chatbot/server && npm run dev"
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd basic && npm install && cd ../chatbot/frontend && npm install && cd ../server && npm install
